contexts.context: ..., before the war with the northern men. <mark>Ayem</mark> came first to the village of the netchimen,...
...were like stars or the messages of stars. <mark>Ayem</mark> took a netchiman's wife and said:
...an image and a seven-syllable spell, <mark>AYEM</mark> AE SEHTI AE VEHK, which you will repeat...
Then <mark>Ayem</mark> threw the netchiman's wife into the ocean water where...
